content.html:
Format-Checking aims at validating the quality of the formatting worksystem.

Formats should not leave out important information.

“Facts” should be cut in such a way that the maximum amount of context surrounding them is given. Context will be critical to how rooters will interpret said fact.

As for all other operations on Exorde, a small stake in EXD will be deducted from your virtual wallet to avoid spamming and enforce quality.

Every “fact” will require a consensus of votes to be accepted. If a “fact” is rejected, the entire format is rejected.

Format-Checkers are rewarded based on the amount of votes they have cast towards the consensus. Voting against the consensus in losing your stake.
